mapper.insert: insert into base_menu (id, pid, name, code, type, sort, enabled, icon, remark, update_time, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, pid, name, code, type, sort, enabled, icon, remark, update_time, create_time from base_menu
